description: Overview of API Gateway resources in a region, supporting REST, HTTP, and WebSocket APIs.
title: API Gateway Overview (Multi-API)

Account.name: Account
Account.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cloud_account_id') as `cloud_account_id`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE 
 metric_name like '%aws_ApiGateway%'
GROUP BY `cloud_account_id`

Region.name: Region
Region.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'cloud_region') as `cloud_region`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE 
 metric_name like '%aws_ApiGateway%'
 and JSONExtractString(labels, 'cloud_account_id') IN {{.Account}}
GROUP BY `cloud_region`

widgets.description: The total number API requests in a given period.
widgets.title: Requests

widgets.description: The time between when API Gateway receives a request from a client and when it returns a response to the client.
widgets.title: Latency

widgets.description: The number of server-side errors captured in a given period.
widgets.title: 5XX Errors

widgets.description: The time between when API Gateway relays a request to the backend and when it receives a response from the backend.
widgets.title: Integration Latency

widgets.description:
The number of requests served from the API cache in a given period.

See CacheHitCount at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-metrics-and-dimensions.html for more details
widgets.title: Cache Hits

widgets.description:
The number of requests served from the backend in a given period, when API caching is enabled.

See CacheMissCount at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-metrics-and-dimensions.html for more details
widgets.title: Cache Misses

widgets.description: The total number of HTTP API requests in a given period.
widgets.title: Requests

widgets.description: The number of client-side errors (4XX errors) in a given period.
widgets.title: 4XX Errors

widgets.description: The number of server-side errors (5XX errors) in a given period.
widgets.title: 5XX Errors

widgets.description: The total time between when API Gateway receives a request from a client and when it returns a response to the client.
widgets.title: Latency

widgets.description: The amount of data processed in bytes for HTTP API requests.
widgets.title: Data Processed

widgets.description: The number of messages sent to the $connect route integration.
widgets.title: Connect Count

widgets.description: The number of messages sent to your WebSocket API.
widgets.title: Message Count

widgets.description: The number of requests that return a 4XX response from API Gateway before the integration is invoked.
widgets.title: Client Errors (4XX)

widgets.description: Errors that occurred when calling the integration (5XX responses).
widgets.title: Execution Errors (5XX)

widgets.description: The number of requests that return a 4XX/5XX response from the integration.
widgets.title: Integration Errors

widgets.description: The time between when API Gateway relays a request to the backend and when it receives a response from the backend. This metric applies to both HTTP and WebSocket APIs.
widgets.title: Integration Latency
